dcterms:creator: M. Bosch
K. Foster
G. Christie
S. Wang

M. Brown
dcterms:description: A remote sensing semantic stereo dataset with images from Worldview-3 multi-view imagery, containing 26,709 training and validation images and 14,529 test images, each of size 2048 Ã— 2048 pixels. The primary task is stereo image matching and disparity generation, with DSM data and a five-class surface classification map provided.
dcterms:title: US3D Dataset

dcterms:description: The ISPRS Potsdam dataset consists of 38 true orthophoto images and corresponding normalized DSM images, with a spatial resolution of 5cm. The dataset includes five main land cover categories: impervious surfaces, buildings, low vegetation, trees, and cars.
dcterms:title: ISPRS Potsdam Dataset

dcterms:description: The ISPRS Vaihingen dataset consists of patches cut from a large true orthophoto associated with the town of Vaihingen, with a spatial resolution of 9cm. Each patch contains three bands: Near-Infrared, Red, and Green, along with a corresponding normalized DSM.
dcterms:title: ISPRS Vaihingen Dataset
